name: The Fool
interpretation:
The freedom of working with a blank slate - beginner's mind. Exploration and the space to play and discover.
(But naivety can get you into trouble…)

name: The Magician
interpretation:
Taking appropriate action - expertise, intention and discipline in a new endeavour.
(But a little knowledge can be a dangerous thing, both for you and for those who believe you!)

name: The High Priestess
interpretation:
Truly listening - to others, to circumstance, and to your gut. Preserving purity; private reflection.
(But there's a danger to getting lost in your own head.)

name: The Empress
interpretation:
Nurturing self and others; generative and protective; connected with one's body.
(But sometimes care and safety can tip over into smothering and self-indulgence…)

name: The Emperor
interpretation:
Clarity of leadership - setting boundaries and managing others. Creating structure, tempering strong will with wisdom.
(But authority can slip into rigidity and stubbornness…)

name: The Hierophant
interpretation:
A wise and trusted teacher - connected with tradition, learning, wisdom and community. Wisdom and knowledge in the service of all.
(But knowledge can lock us into restrictive dogmatism…)

name: The Lovers
interpretation:
A transformative choice - opting into a harmonious, fulfilling union.
(But a strong bond can narrow our focus and overshadow our self-knowledge and connection to the wider world…)

name: The Chariot
interpretation:
Breaking through obstacles - mustering your forces to achieve total victory.
(But a big win can seem like the most important thing in the world and lead to complacency or self-centredness…)

name: Strength
interpretation:
Imposing restrictions on yourself for your own good - taming the beast. Restraining impulsivity for the sake of long-term intentions.
(But what damage happens when that strength eventually fails?)

name: The Hermit
interpretation:
Time alone to recharge and reframe - examining the deep self to find clarity.
(But this train of thought can lead us to place ourselves above or away from others…)

name: The Wheel of Fortune
gloss: Luck, randomness, cycles, karma, fate, revolution
interpretation:
Taking a step back to look at the big picture - examining the trends, patterns, or cycles in the world. And sometimes, pattern and chance combine to bring you a big change!
(But on the far end of this perspective can lie fatalism or risky gambles…)

name: Justice
interpretation:
Weighing up the issues to make the right call - keeping a level head.
(But this can stray into obsessing endlessly over the whys and wherefores, or overlooking your own biases…)

name: The Hanged Man
interpretation:
Taking a harder road can lead to a new angle on things, bringing a clarity and pushing towards change.
(But this journey can be obstructed by a rigid sense of self, or by blame and the need to be right…)

name: Death
interpretation:
When a chapter comes to an end, we look back and reflect on the ups and downs, before moving onto a new one, as a new version of ourselves.
(But we can end up obsessing over the inevitability of endings, or clinging to something that’s gone…)

name: Temperance
interpretation:
Bringing together opposites - finding compromise, creating the new by combining the old. Spectrums, not binaries.
(But forced compromise without understanding can end up widening divides…)

name: The Devil
interpretation:
Embracing the messy reality of human nature and desire - it can't always be managed, and it's not going to go away just because you think it should. Goblin mode.
(But sometimes we think we're understanding our dark side when we're actually just indulging it, at the expense of ourselves and others...)

name: The Tower
interpretation:
Sometimes everything falls apart and you just have to start fresh. It can be traumatic, but major upheaval can strip away the inessential, and set us on a better path if we're paying attention to the hard lessons it brings.
(But if we try to cling to the same-old, we just end up reliving our loss...)

name: The Star
gloss: Hope, optimism, openness, certainty, faith, longing, truth
interpretation:
The calm AFTER the storm - this is when we rebuild and reconcile with what's gone before, including our own responsibility for it.
(But if we don't commit to that work, we end up falling into despair or self-deception - rehashing, not rebuilding…)

name: The Moon
gloss: Mystery, fantasy, imagination, dreams, uncertainty, the unconscious
interpretation:
There are more things in heaven and earth than are dreamt of in our philosophy. We can embrace the unknown and the mysterious - there's only so far we can get with rationality.
(But on the far side of this lies separating from reality entirely, or becoming indifferent to the fantastical...)

name: The Sun
interpretation:
You're never too old for joy - it's not naive to let yourself feel that moment of 'all is well'. You can recognise your own success and capability - actually, you've got this.
(But self-appreciation can tip over into self-obsession at the expense of connection to others, or lead you to over-exert yourself...)

name: Judgement
interpretation:
You've done the hard work on yourself, so when The Call came in, you were ready to answer. You're ready to start the next chapter, and now you've got a mission.
(But what if you weren't ready? What if you ignored the call?)

name: The World
interpretation:
The cycle is complete - you're back where you started, but with self-knowledge that has changed you. You can move ahead with a peace that is because of the world, not in spite of it. It's all connected - your past and your present, your dark and light, your self and the other.
But it's never too late to forget the lessons you learned, and fall back into a fractured worldview through fear, greed, desire for control, and so on. The work of integration is ongoing!

name: Ace of Wands
interpretation:
Boom! The flash of inspiration - the moment of opportunity!
(But what if you're too slow to grab it?)

name: Two of Wands
interpretation:
A fork in the road - there's not just one way to do something, but you've got to make a choice.
(But what kind of trouble will you get into if you try and do both at once?)

name: Three of Wands
interpretation:
Let's get stuck in - you're off to a strong start, and now it's onto the next step.
(But what if you put it off? What if you started with too vague a plan to know what's next?)

name: Four of Wands
interpretation:
We did it! We made it happen as a team - we've earned a celebration.
(But what if you just keep pushing without recognising the win?)

name: Five of Wands
interpretation:
Nothing complex ever got done without conflict - do you manage it calmly and empathetically?
(Or does it descend into an endless, unproductive fight?)

name: Six of Wands
interpretation:
A moment in the spotlight! You've done great, or you're giving a shoutout to someone who has.
(But what if you're a sore loser? Or even a sore winner?)

name: Seven of Wands
interpretation:
Sticking to your guns - weathering the pushback for what you believe.
(But having a chip on your shoulder can lead you to isolate yourself or even take stupid risks. Alternatively, what if you just let everyone walk all over you?)

name: Eight of Wands
interpretation:
Catching the moment and taking action - thinking on your feet.
(But what if you panic? What if you can't handle change?)

name: Nine of Wands
interpretation:
In it for the long haul - your determination will get you through this.
(Or are you making a martyr of yourself? Are you beating a dead horse?)

name: Ten of Wands
interpretation:
Carrying a lot - lots of balls in the air, or lots of weight on your shoulders. Are you recognising your limits?
(Or are you overcommitting yourself, again?)

name: Page of Wands
interpretation:
A can-do attitude! So ready to learn, and so up for a challenge.
(But are you relying on approval to bolster your self-image? Are you trying to do everything yourself at the cost of quality?)

name: Knight of Wands
interpretation:
Blazing a trail - full of purpose and energy, and ride-or-die loyal to your friends!
(But are you blundering ahead and leaving chaos in your wake? Do you know what you're doing?)

name: Queen of Wands
interpretation:
Bringing the team together - you know your people, and you're building a harmonious unit working towards a common goal.
(But what if you lose focus on the goal in favour of getting attention?)

name: King of Wands
interpretation:
Adventurous problem-solving - innovating boldly!
(But what if you're ignoring the boring but better solution in favour of something that serves your need to be clever?)

name: Ace of Cups
interpretation:
Emotional openness - letting yourself love and receive love.
(But can you deal with that love not being reciprocated?)

name: Two of Cups
interpretation:
Two people coming together - the 'click' - mutual attraction.
(But what if you lose your sense of self in that connection? What if you don't feel like you wished you did? What if you never find that someone?)

name: Three of Cups
interpretation:
Celebrating connectedness - feeling joy in mutual affection, acts of service as a love language.
(But what if it's just naïve giddiness? What if you're not prepared to deal with the ways in which you and those close to you don't mesh together?)

name: Four of Cups
interpretation:
Keeping stable, valuing steadiness.
(Or just falling into a rut, becoming jaded, passing up opportunities for real happiness in favour of 'the devil you know')

name: Five of Cups
gloss: Loss, despair, re-evaluation, regret, uncertainty, repentance
interpretation:
Acknowledging loss and moving on - grieving healthily.
(Or not doing any of that - wallowing in pain, reliving your loss without reframing it, never trying anything again!)

name: Six of Cups
interpretation:
Giving your time and energy to the service of others - taking joy in building success for others.
(Alternatively, depending on the gratitude of others for your self-worth, or taking advantage of others' misfortune for your own glory.)

name: Seven of Cups
interpretation:
Visualise the prize! Deriving motivation and action from your wildest dreams.
(Or getting lost in them - or in your nightmare imaginings of terrible consequences both foreseen and unforeseen.)

name: Eight of Cups
interpretation:
There's more to life than this - you've got to know when to strike out on your own and search for something better.
(Or are you running at the first sign of trouble? Conversely, are you sticking around and complaining long after you should have left?)

name: Nine of Cups
interpretation:
Recognising your success and talents, and indulging in the rewards that they brought you.
(Or are you too busy patting yourself on the back to keep doing the work that got you here? Will you ever be satisfied?)

name: Ten of Cups
interpretation:
You never knew you could find such riches - you have found success and reward, but the true reward is the connections you made.
(Or are your unrealistic dreams preventing you from finding the balance and joy you could have? Has your success prevented you from connecting to others?)

name: Page of Cups
interpretation:
Heart on your sleeve, butterflies in your stomach - swept up by the excitement of new love!
(But are you moving too fast for yourself? Are you trying to force a situation that isn't going to happen?)

name: Knight of Cups
interpretation:
Passion is your guide - and that can bring great strength.
(But you can run into all kinds of trouble when you're trying to solve a problem with your heart that you should be solving with your head.)

name: Queen of Cups
interpretation:
Empathy and spirituality can allow for incredibly deep connections to others.
(But are you weighing yourself down borrowing trouble from those around you?)

name: King of Cups
interpretation:
Compassionate authority, responding to the emotional experience of others without being ruled by your own emotions.
(But are you really as dispassionate as you think you are? Are you emotionally self-regulating or just self-censoring?)

name: Ace of Swords
interpretation:
Staying logical and sticking to the facts - thinking it through.
(But are you all head and no heart? Is your logical going to lead to unintended consequences for real human beings?)

name: Two of Swords
interpretation:
Hearing both sides and staying calm and balanced in a discussion.
(Or cherry-picking your evidence, fence-sitting, or playing devil's advocate for the sake of it…)

name: Three of Swords
interpretation:
Sometimes, the truth hurts. It's rough, but at least now you know and can move forward.
(Or can you? Are you just going to get stuck in despair?)

name: Four of Swords
interpretation:
A quiet moment to get your thoughts straight - calming down and working the problem.
(Or failing to do so, and procrastinating under the guise of taking care…)

name: Five of Swords
interpretation:
Taking a moral stand and not backing down - even bending the rules for the sake of what you feel to be right.
(Or just provoking others into a fight, or ignoring the rules you agreed to abide by!)

name: Six of Swords
gloss: A fresh start, adjustments, science, travel
interpretation:
Recovering from defeat and making the best of your situation - going somewhere new to get a fresh perspective.
(Or refusing to accept that things have changed, or assuming that the whole world should be just like your small corner of it.)

name: Seven of Swords
interpretation:
Acting ethically, whether in public or private, and handling a difficult situation with finesse.
(Or lying and cheating wherever you can get away with it, and using others' dishonesty to justify your own.)

name: Eight of Swords
interpretation:
Can you operate healthily within the limits imposed on you?
(Or are you trapped in a cage and blinded by fear?)

name: Nine of Swords
interpretation:
Can you accept what you cannot control, and calm your troubled mind?
(Or are you torturing yourself with regret and self-recrimination, second-guessing every move before you make it?)

name: Ten of Swords
interpretation:
Knowing when you've hit rock bottom - the worst is over.
(Or is it? Is there still worse to come? Has this fall broken you beyond recovery?)

name: Page of Swords
interpretation:
Avid learning - asking the right questions, eager to take it all in.
(Or being unable to deal with conflicting information, or pretending to expertise you do not possess…)

name: Knight of Swords
interpretation:
Analytic agility - thinking clearly and speaking your mind.
(Or arrogantly overriding others, distorting evidence, or passing off opinion as fact.)

name: Queen of Swords
interpretation:
Tact and diplomacy - defusing a tense situation with a quick wit.
(Or using that wit to viciously cut others down!)

name: King of Swords
interpretation:
Intelligent leadership - relying on evidence, expertise and reason to make the optimal call.
(Or waffling on an important decision, vaunting your intellectual prowess, or insisting on having the last word…)

name: Ace of Coins
interpretation:
Right now, you have everything you need. You’re set to start making a plan to achieve prosperity.
(Or are you never satisfied with what you have, and can find a cloud to go with every silver lining?)

name: Two of Coins
interpretation:
Balancing your budget and priorities before you get to a crisis point.
(Or making hasty decisions that only work in the short term, or overextending your resources unnecessarily…)

name: Three of Coins
interpretation:
Using the resources at your disposal to craft something masterfully and to specification.
(Or compromising on quality, mis-managing your effort and resources, or failing to meet the brief.)

name: Four of Coins
interpretation:
Conserving your resources and avoiding unnecessary expenditure.
(Or hoarding them at the cost of your wellbeing - false economies!)

name: Five of Coins
interpretation:
Recognising your needs and the help available in a tight time.
(Or refusing help when you need it out of sheer pride.)

name: Six of Coins
interpretation:
Giving and receiving - redistributing resources for the betterment of all.
(Or using charity as a means to your own ends, or failing to do your part for others.)

name: Seven of Coins
interpretation:
Good work takes time, and the readiness to make changes as you go to get the best results.
(Or you can fall into the trap of nostalgia for the old ways, or bemoaning lost opportunities, or judging your own work harshly.)

name: Eight of Coins
interpretation:
Taking pride in your craft - working hard to get it just right.
(Or working yourself to death, or just coasting along having lost your commitment to quality.)

name: Nine of Coins
interpretation:
Hard work and diligence has brought you to a point of mastery - you know what you're about.
(Or are you way in over your head? Have you told yourself you've already learned enough?)

name: Ten of Coins
interpretation:
Celebrating your blessings - recognising and sharing the plenty you have accrued.
(Or blowing it all to impress others, or knowing the cost of everything and the value of nothing.)

name: Page of Coins
interpretation:
Ready to get stuck in and work hard - embarking on a journey to mastery.
(Or living on impulse, spending your resources recklessly, and getting stuck on the opinions of others.)

name: Knight of Coins
interpretation:
Working methodically and steadily is what will get you to your goal, as will working creatively with the resources at your disposal.
(Or you just throw caution to the wind and squander what you have, or copy others instead of working hard for yourself.)

name: Queen of Coins
interpretation:
Appreciating the good things - treating yourself and those around you with generosity.
(Or becoming insatiable and greedy, and becoming entitled.)

name: King of Coins
interpretation:
Order and stability - you got to this place of wealth by being careful and steady.
(But maybe you've become so conservative that you resist any change whatsoever, or you've become solely focussed on getting more and keeping it to yourself.)
